data.name: My Cute Succubus
data.detailed_description:
♥A HELLISH LOVE STORY♥

✟My Cute Succubus✟ - a visual religiously-satirical novel with casual “Match3” gameplay in the setting of Christian Hell.

♥GO TO HELL for your sins!♥

Meet ✟Your Cute Succubus ✟! She really needs your help! Hell is in a deep decline, all management is in complete disarray and the local fiends are not enough to torture the newcoming sinners.

Only YOU can help Succubus to complete the monthly soul purchasing quota! Your task is simple – convince a young religious nun to sell her immortal soul to the Devil!

♥YOUR SOUL SHALL BURN IN HELL FOREVER♥

And in the meantime you can get to know the cutest and the deadliest denizens of Hell: usurpers, dictators and even the chairwoman of the Central Committee of the CPSU.
Hitler and Stalin are lonely at the 8-th circle of Hell waiting for the Last Judgment. Get to know them better and reveal the motives of their actions during their lives on Earth.

♥FEATURES♥:

  • A hellish love story in a Christian setting
  • Classic visual novel with a Match3 gameplay
  • 11 vivid Live2d animations
  • Animated 3d backgrounds
  • Branching story with multiple endings
  • Excellent Lofi hip hop by the mind-blowing G374 and the masterly smth.nothing ♥


This game does not contain non-tolerance, any religious of any political organizations and anything like that. Only love and mutual understanding. Make Match3, not war ♥

data.short_description: ✟My Cute Succubus✟ - a simple and fun satirical visual novel with “Match3” gameplay, featuring the Christian Hell setting. Meet the Succubus and other inhabitants of Hell!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,28 Ghz or faste
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Mature imagery, Sexual Content. 

Users can meet characters in the game where they are in suggestive poses.
